statements: SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, email_recipients, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM email_campaign_data;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, email_recipients FROM email_campaign_data;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM email_campaign_data ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, email_recipients FROM email_campaign_data WHERE email_recipients > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM email_campaign_data WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM email_campaign_data WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, end_date FROM email_campaign_data WHERE email_recipients < 10000 AND conversion_rate > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM email_campaign_data WHERE click_through_rate BETWEEN 0.02 AND 0.08 ORDER BY start_date ASC, conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT SUM(email_recipients) AS total_recipients, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM email_campaign_data;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_recipients < 500;
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY total_recipients DESC;
SELECT recipient_email, email_opened, click_timestamp FROM campaign_emails WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY total_recipients DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks FROM email_campaigns WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_emails_sent FROM campaign_emails GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT campaign_name, AVG(total_clicks) AS avg_clicks FROM email_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING AVG(total_clicks) > 500;
SELECT * FROM Campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type FROM Campaign WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Subscriber ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, open_rate, click_rate FROM Campaign INNER JOIN CampaignStats ON Campaign.campaign_id = CampaignStats.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM Campaign INNER JOIN CampaignStats ON Campaign.campaign_id = CampaignStats.campaign_id WHERE conversion_rate > 0.2;
SELECT * FROM Campaign WHERE campaign_type = 'Email' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT c.campaign_name, s.email, cs.open_rate FROM Campaign c JOIN CampaignStats cs ON c.campaign_id = cs.campaign_id JOIN Subscriber s ON cs.stat_id = s.subscriber_id;
SELECT c.campaign_name, cs.click_rate FROM Campaign c LEFT JOIN CampaignStats cs ON c.campaign_id = cs.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name HAVING SUM(cs.click_rate) > 100;

SELECT DISTINCT c.campaign_name, s.first_name, s.last_name FROM Campaign c JOIN CampaignStats cs ON c.campaign_id = cs.campaign_id JOIN Subscriber s ON cs.stat_id = s.subscriber_id ORDER BY c.campaign_name ASC, s.last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT recipient_id, email_address FROM recipients WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, total_recipients, open_rate, click_rate FROM campaigns WHERE click_rate > 0.2;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM recipients WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns LIMIT 10
SELECT recipient_id, email_address, first_name, last_name FROM recipients WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT recipient_id, email_address, first_name, last_name FROM recipients ORDER BY first_name DESC, last_name ASC

SELECT clicks.click_timestamp, campaigns.campaign_name, recipients.email_address FROM clicks JOIN campaigns ON clicks.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id JOIN recipients ON clicks.recipient_id = recipients.recipient_id;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT contact_id, email, first_name, last_name FROM Contacts WHERE subscription_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT email_id, sent_datetime, delivery_status FROM SentEmails ORDER BY sent_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM OpenedEmails WHERE open_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.campaign_name, cc.email, se.delivery_status FROM Campaigns c JOIN SentEmails se ON c.campaign_id = se.campaign_id JOIN Contacts cc ON cc.contact_id = se.contact_id;

SELECT cl.link_url, c.campaign_name, co.first_name, co.last_name FROM ClickedLinks cl JOIN SentEmails se ON cl.email_id = se.email_id JOIN Contacts co ON co.contact_id = se.contact_id JOIN Campaigns c ON c.campaign_id = se.campaign_id;

SELECT se.sent_datetime, oe.open_datetime, c.campaign_name FROM SentEmails se LEFT JOIN OpenedEmails oe ON se.email_id = oe.email_id JOIN Campaigns c ON c.campaign_id = se.campaign_id WHERE oe.open_datetime IS NOT NULL ORDER BY se.sent_datetime DESC;
